title: Implementing Generic Types in Rust
description: In this lab, we learn how to implement generic types and methods in Rust, allowing us to specify different type parameters when using the struct or calling the methods.

meta.title: Rust Generic Types and Methods | Programming Tutorials
meta.description: Learn how to implement generic types and methods in Rust, allowing you to specify different type parameters for your code.
meta.keywords: Rust, Generic Types, Generic Methods, Programming Tutorials, Rust Programming
